description: A friendly welcome awaits in this historic family restaurant serving authentic, traditional Piedmontese cuisine, where dishes such as peppers stuffed with tuna and anchovies, agnolotti monferrini (a type of ravioli), finanziera stew and bonet (a typical dessert) feature on the menu. At Violetta, you not only eat well, you’re also made to feel extremely welcome.
